Control Name: SC-21 SECURE NAME / ADDRESS RESOLUTION SERVICE (RECURSIVE OR CACHING RESOLVER)
Control Statement: The information system requests and performs data origin authentication and data integrity verification on the name/address resolution responses the system receives from authoritative sources.
